item.title: Greenwashing – Are you Falling Victim?
item.author: Dunin Borkowska,Aleksandra A,
item.description: Efforts to decrease the environmental impact of our consumer culture are being prevented by confusion over terminology and outrageous greenwashing. In a world where ‘sustainability’ is all the rage, you might be drawn to the chocolate bar with a small green leaf on it, making promises of …
